thread.title: Stanley, Nicola

author: Stanley, Nicola
title: Stanley, Nicola
text:
The easiest blinds I have ever fitted . I ordered lots of samples before I picked the exact fabric I wanted and these arrived very quickly . The ordering of the actual blinds could not of been easier . I was nervous that they would not fit but when they arrived the were a perfect fit for my windows .
So so easy to put it . All in all 10/10
